patterns: How do i register for the bank account?

responses: Go to nearby bank and fill up a registration form

patterns: How do I get all my money fom the bank?
Give me all my money from the bank?
responses: For getting the cash on hand visit the nearby bank or ATM counter and do the necessary process.For digital money link your digital wallet to the ebanking application.

patterns: If and how much interest have I received?
Have I received any interest from the bank?
responses: You will receive an interest of 5% of your available balance in your bank.
Calculate your monthly interests by a simple formula:InterestReceived=availableBalance+0.05*availableBalance

responses: We protect our customers information using uptodate security algorithms which requires Years to break.So hacking is almost impossible.
Don't worry! Your information are safe with us.
